front.title: When to use RFC 6553, 6554 and IPv6-in-IPv6

abstract.t: This document looks at different data flows through LLN networks where RPL is used to establish routing. The document enumerates the cases where RFC 6553, RFC 6554 and IPv6-in-IPv6 encapsulation is required. This analysis provides the basis on which to design efficient compression of these headers.
